desc: Project Details..1.	 Video Editing Needed.  We need about a 45 second clip put together of just outdoor activities going on.  Some Text & High Quality After Effects needed. We will supply the footage here, however we will not be able to cut down file size as we do not completely understand After Effects.  We are looking for a long term partner who understands After Effect / Premiere that we can give projects to instead of saying no to our clients.  If the video is high quality it will definitely result in more work.2.	Photoshop Project.   We need a larger sized 24 inch x 36 inch Info Graphic for a class that is coming up soon.  This project will likely be a kayaking class that will be offered very soon.  We will not be able to supply the images on this, so you will have to retrieve the images yourself on this part (from Google or Bing).  Of course we cannot use any copyrighted images on this infographic.  We will show a layout that we are looking for as far as the final result.  This will require a large amount of background removal for photos, and we are hoping to have some small lighting effects as well.3.	We need a background removed from 1 additional photo with a text overlay on the top of the picture.We are hoping to find a long term partner that we can send our video editing requests to.  Currently we are getting requests to edit video, however we are a Web Design Agency & have been unable to help with these requests from our clients.   Please let us know if you have any questions we can help with.  Thank you.

desc: Dear FriendsWe are hiring Animation Professionals for our Medical Cartoon project.Budget: $4 USD per Hour (If we do enjoy your work, we will be rising your pay as we go)Hours: Full TIme up to 40 per week / Part Time up to 20 per weekStage: ITarget Audience: kids from 6-13 years old.Cartoon Series: 2 cartoons per month / 104 cartoons per year issued on by-weekly basis.Message: We bring information for the most vulnerable members of our society, to our children, about different bacterias and diseases that live in surrounding world and inside our body, and their functions.Requirements: We are looking for a creative and dedicated cartoon/animation professional(s) who will be able to transform our message into exciting and engaging cartoon, in bright colors, and fantasy-superheroes and mega-monsters scenario. Superheros and mega-monster characters should be designed by you as well under supervision and guidance of our authors.Very important: We want to make sure that our message is easily digestible and clearly comprehensible by wider audience, not just kids! Cartoon should be very engaging for wider audience, therefore they should be designed accordingly.Cooperation: You will be working with our award winning writers/authors in order to adjust your content to the best possible balance between video and literature.Additional Reward: your name can be included into our project team if you perform well and you will be willing to be recognised for your contribution.VIdeo Time: Each Cartoon should be up to ~5 minutes long.Samples: we randomly selected few different visualisations that might be suitable for the project, however , we are opened for professional opinions. Please keep in mind, that your opinion will influence our decision!  Please provide a sample of your design for:File 1 :Human neutrophil ingesting [url removed, login to view] ( [url removed, login to view]:[url removed, login to view] )File 2: Penicilin ( [url removed, login to view] )File 2.2: Penicilin ( [url removed, login to view] )Monster Image Sample:File 3.1: [url removed, login to view]File 3.2: [url removed, login to view]File 3.3:[url removed, login to view]NOTE: Please feel free to recommend your ideas and video solutions, based on your experience and feedbacks of your customers.For Those Who Are Parents, what would your child/children look at with High Level of engagement?Stage: IIDesign of the packaging and advertisement videos for supporting products: books and toys information will be provided to the winner of the bid.Thank  youThallium Team
title: Cartoon Series with Medical content for kids

desc: I’m currently working on a new film, I'm running out of time so I’m trying to find someone to help with some of the elements.I'm working with C4D and Octane, the Characters are coming out of Daz3D. Here are the main area's I need help with:- I have a character with blood and injuries applied, the textures need improving and making more realistic. As our scenes are animated in Daz and imported into C4D it would need to fit this workflow.- Separately I have some decomposing body parts that I’m currently not happy with the results - I need someone to either retexture what I have or create something from scratch.- Also, I have a character interacting with an object covered in hair/fur. The hair will need to be simulated, stylised, textured and interacting with the hands. The animations will come from motion capture imported from Daz.- Lastly, I need to model from scratch an object/surface for the character to interact with.More generally the general skin textures could also be improved, but this is not a priority at this stage.If you feel like you can only take on part of this that will also work.Look forward to hearing from you.
title: CGI Character Animation, Modelling, Texturing
